title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 62.1 - Applications
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 62.1 - Applications

State Regulations

Applications filed with the State Comptroller pursuant to
the provisions of section
124.10
of
the Local Finance Law shall comply with the provisions of this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
62.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
